docs.text: D4T: Design for testability This repository contains the source code and replication package for our creative learning-based ‘design for testability’ approach in software systems. More information is available at https://github.com/m-zakeri/D4T . Note: The full implementation will be available after our relevant paper(s) are published.
docs.title: D4T: Design for testability
